Package spring.controller

Class CommentController

  • java.lang.Object
    • spring.controller.AbstractController
      • spring.controller.CommentController
  • @Controller
public class CommentController
extends AbstractController
    This Controller handles all requests for URLs beginning with "/comment". This controller is designed for the creation and manipulation of Comment objects.
    Author:
    Shane Lockwood

      • newComment

        @PostMapping("/comment/new/create")
public org.springframework.web.servlet.view.RedirectView newComment​(@RequestParam(value="comment",required=true)
                                                                    java.lang.String comment,
                                                                    javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session,
                                                                    javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Accepts parameters from the new comment form to create and save a Comment object.
        Parameters:
        comment - The String containing the comment provided by the client.
        session - The HttpSession passed between the client and server.
        request - The HttpServletRequest which stores the UserPrincipal.
        Returns:
        model

      • commentVote

        @PostMapping("/comment/new/vote")
public org.springframework.web.servlet.view.RedirectView commentVote​(@RequestParam(value="upVote",required=true)
                                                                     java.lang.String upVote,
                                                                     @RequestParam(value="commentId",required=true)
                                                                     java.lang.Integer commentId,
                                                                     javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session,
                                                                     javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Adds or modifies a CommentVote.
        Parameters:
        upVote - The String representation of a boolean.
        commentId - The Integer for the associated Comment.
        session - The HttpSession passed between the client and server.
        request - The HttpServletRequest which stores the UserPrincipal.
        Returns:
        model
